86b6('dul ba): tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'ong ba la gzhes so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon
86b7('dul ba): med zas byin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gis yang dag par dgyes par 'gyur pas yang dag par dgyes par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das ci ga bde bar
86b8('dul ba): mnal tam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos la/ /zag med rab tu rnam grol ba/ /mya ngan yongs 'das bram ze ni/ /thams cad du ni bde
87a1('dul ba): bar mnal/ /'dir ni re ba kun bcad nas/ /thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal cing / /zhi ba thob pa'i thugs kyis na/ /nye bar zhi ba bde bar mnal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon
87a2('dul ba): med zas sbyin khrid nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu
87a3('dul ba): 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang
87a4('dul ba): dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang /
87a5('dul ba): 'dod pa rnams mnog chung ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang 'thun pa'i
87a6('dul ba): chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan zhing yang dag
87a7('dul ba): phul gyi chos bshad pa kun shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung
87a8('dul ba): dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ /dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan de nyid la
87b1('dul ba): 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig
87b2('dul ba): pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las
87b3('dul ba): langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag
87b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags
87b5('dul ba): so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ci/ btsun pa bdag gi ming bzang sbyin lags mod kyi bdag gis mgon ma mchis pa
87b6('dul ba): rnams la 'tshal ma stsol bas des na bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar skye bos 'tshal to/ /khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/ btsun pa yul bra tsi na zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la pa rnams kyi grong rdal mnyan
87b7('dul ba): yod ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de na bdag mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shig dang / bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na
87b8('dul ba): bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi lags so/ /khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ btsun pa
88a1('dul ba): ma mchis lags so/ /khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig dang / bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan
88a2('dul ba): yod du dge slong rnams mchis pa dang / gzhan du mchi ba dang / mchi bar sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas
88a3('dul ba): gnang ngo / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
88a4('dul ba): song ngo / de nas rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba dang bsgrub pa gang yin pa de thams cad byas shing bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig
88a5('dul ba): tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong cig stsal du gsol/ de dang lhan cig
88a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong su zhig gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye
88a7('dul ba): bo'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
88a8('dul ba): 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan
88b1('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/
88b2('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/ gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab nas de lhung bzed dang chos
88b3('dul ba): gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam rgyags mang po khyer nas nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste phyin nas de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga'
88b4('dul ba): ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal nas bskyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal nas nags tshal du 'chag pas 'chag pa na dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras so/ /mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la ha cang yang
88b5('dul ba): mi nye ba dang nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs gang na yod pa der bdag gis
88b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig na phyogs de gang na yod snyam pa las/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la
88b7('dul ba): ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku cho nyung ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas
88b8('dul ba): kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ de rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gzhon nu rgyal byed la
89a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol cig der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/ /des smras pa/ khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ni ma yin
89a2('dul ba): te/ bskyed mos tshal yin mod kyi de nga'i yin no/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol cig /
89a3('dul ba): bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/ /khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gser bye ba gshibs kyang nga mi gtod do// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po dgu bcu pa/ yang khyim bdag mgon med
89a4('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bkum lags kyis dbyig dang / gser bzhes shig /kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lags so/ /rin thang sus
89a5('dul ba): bcad/ khyod kyis rin thang bkum mod/ /de gnyis rin thang bcad do/ /rin thang bcad do zhes rtsod par gyur nas zhal ce gcod pa'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang / bar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems
89a6('dul ba): te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig par brtson gyis de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas de nas zhal lce gcod pa'i mir bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas dgos pa'i phyir
89a7('dul ba): 'dus so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal ce gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen
89a8('dul ba): po la gtogs pa rnams la don de rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bcad zin gyis gser long shig /kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin no/ /de cang mi
89b1('dul ba): smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta dang / rgya dang / gzeb dang / rnga mo dang / glang dang / bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal nas 'ongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad gshib
89b2('dul ba): par brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ gang gis ma bkram
89b3('dul ba): pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang ma yin ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ khyim bdag
89b4('dul ba): m gon med zas sbyin ni gdon mi za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po chen po chen po 'di snyed yongs su btang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces
89b5('dul ba): smras so/ /khyim bdag gal te khyod 'gyod pa skyes na gser slar long shig /kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin no/ /gzhon nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te 'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug
89b6('dul ba): pa ni bdag gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkab nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo/ /de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du
89b7('dul ba): sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa ma zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la da ltar khyim bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po 'di snyed yongs
89b8('dul ba): su gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la byin cig /der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o/
90a1('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang rtsig tu bcug go/ /de nas khyim
90a2('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams pa dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas klongs pa'i yid can rnams 'dus nas khyim bdag mgon med
90a3('dul ba): zas sbyin gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod dge sbyong gau ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsig shig /ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer bgos te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i rgyal po'i khab yin no/ /
90a4('dul ba): kho bo cag gi ni mnyan yod yin no/ /des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/ bdag gi nor ma bgos pas gang la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go/ /de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba
90a5('dul ba): dang / der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi brtol can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod dga' mgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan
90a6('dul ba): thos kyi mchog cig 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig /des smras pa/ rung gis re shig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon
90a7('dul ba): med zas sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag
90a8('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod dga' mgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi
90b1('dul ba): mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i
90b2('dul ba): rtsa ba chung zad yod dam 'on te med ces bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo / /su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na bdag kho na la'o/ /yang bsams pa ji 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig
90b3('dul ba): gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod par mthong ngo / /dus ji srid kyis tshogs par 'gyur snyam na zhag bdun lon nas so/ /bsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag
90b4('dul ba): de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad
90b5('dul ba): ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu na re de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de rnams kyis bsams pa 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/ yang na ni de
90b6('dul ba): 'bros 'dod do/ /yang na ni de phyogs tshol lo/ /de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos/ bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang / kun du rgyu
90b7('dul ba): mig dmar mthong nas de la de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs
90b8('dul ba): tshol gyis/ khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig /dus ji tsam zhig na/ 'di nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par ro/ /rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron
91a1('dul ba): cig / mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang sems khral skyes nas nyin re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang / nyi ma bgrang bar byed do/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i
91a2('dul ba): sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i khri bshams so/ /yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / de'i nye
91a3('dul ba): 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang
91a4('dul ba): bcas pas mdun du bdar te rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas gdul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas te 'dzum pa sngon du btang nas spyod lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go/ /'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng
91a5('dul ba): bar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci re shig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis byas/ khyod
91a6('dul ba): kyis shig cig tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas na 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par mi nus na kun du rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas kun du rgyu mig dmar
91a7('dul ba): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyis byos shig ngas gzhig go/ /de mig 'phrul byed pa yin pas des shing sa ha ka ra shin du me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang char drag po phab ste/ des de rtsa
91a8('dul ba): ba nas phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gtor te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to/ /de nas des pad ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas des kun du brnal nas ming gi
91b1('dul ba): lhag ma tsam zhig bzhag go/ /des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te des blangs so/ /des ro langs shig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pas
91b2('dul ba): btab pa las nyes par spyod pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas des de nyid la bsnyags pa dang / de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/
91b3('dul ba): 'phags pa shA ri'i bu skyabs su mchi lags kyis yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang ro langs de zhi bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/ de dad pa skyes
91b4('dul ba): nas smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi
91b5('dul ba): 'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin te/ des brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du
91b6('dul ba): byas te dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste 'ur mnyam pa/ rig
91b7('dul ba): pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang
91b8('dul ba): bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te/ smras pa/ 'phags
92a1('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bus ni smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
92a2('dul ba): rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so/ /de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi
92a3('dul ba): byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du
92a4('dul ba): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon
92a5('dul ba): sum du byas so/ /'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/ /mu stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag gis 'di shags kyis tshar bcad mi nus kyis thabs shig
92a6('dul ba): bsham par byas la/ de nas klags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o snyam nas thams cad 'dus te khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams
92a7('dul ba): cad ni bcad pas de bas snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo / /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/
92a8('dul ba): re shig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid nas khyod kyis kho bo
92b1('dul ba): cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad pas de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi 'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
92b2('dul ba): bu bsam pa la zhugs te/ ci 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te med snyam na des yod par mthong ngo / /su zhig la rag lus snyam na/ bdag kho na la 'o snyam nas des bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag de
92b3('dul ba): la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig / de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla mi'i las byed par brtsams pa na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas des de rnams las byed du
92b4('dul ba): gzhug par brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas/ de dang nye ba'i drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug pa dang / de rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ dben pa
92b5('dul ba): na 'dug pas 'di bsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas/ de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong ste bskor nas 'dug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag gi drung du 'ongs snyam
92b6('dul ba): na/ ci tsam na bsad pa'i sems kyis yin par shes nas des lcag thogs sprul pa de sbad nas/ des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongs su bskyab tu
92b7('dul ba): gsol/ des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa re shig song la ngal sor chug shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni gsad par bsams na 'di ni bdag cag la byams par
92b8('dul ba): sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po so sor rtogs par
93a1('dul ba): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te de
93a2('dul ba): rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan
93a3('dul ba): sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi 'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang brtsal bar byas pas
93a4('dul ba): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas
93a5('dul ba): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs
93a6('dul ba): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste 'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa
93a7('dul ba): dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug
93a8('dul ba): lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsams so/ /khyim bdag mgon med
93b1('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum
93b2('dul ba): pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba dang / dga'
93b3('dul ba): ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang
93b4('dul ba): lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dang ba drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/ dad pa
93b5('dul ba): de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu
93b6('dul ba): 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu brtsigs nas yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par
93b7('dul ba): byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na shul so ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag
93b8('dul ba): dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
94a1('dul ba): sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs rgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug / sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug /dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang rgyal
94a2('dul ba): mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin du dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye bar bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug /sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug /dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go/ /
94a3('dul ba): de ltar tshogs bsogs nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tshur spyon/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son pa dang / kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la/ gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam nga ba
94a4('dul ba): chung ngam/ 'tsho 'am bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag
94a5('dul ba): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol cig jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon
94a6('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
94a7('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
94a8('dul ba): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du 'o/ /kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med
94b1('dul ba): zas sbyin gyi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad
94b2('dul ba): kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do/ /zhes mchi 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
94b3('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam
94b4('dul ba): par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che'i mchog glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor
94b5('dul ba): ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba
94b6('dul ba): bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i
94b7('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa
94b8('dul ba): tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin du dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
95a1('dul ba): sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun
95a2('dul ba): nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas
95a3('dul ba): pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas/ mngon par 'du
95a4('dul ba): mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg
95a5('dul ba): ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar
95a6('dul ba): gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /bar snang la yang lha'i rnga brdung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog
95a7('dul ba): ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba rnams
95a8('dul ba): 'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang / gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/ /dma' ba rnams
95b1('dul ba): ni mthon por gyur to/ /mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to/ /glang po che yang skad 'byin to/ /rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /khyim na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin
95b2('dul ba): to/ /long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob bo/ /'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos so/ /lkug pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to/ /dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyis ni dbang po rnams yongs su tshang ba thob bo/ chang gis myos
95b3('dul ba): pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to/ /phan tshun khon byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/ /btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las
95b4('dul ba): thar to/ /nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to/ /de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs
95b5('dul ba): so/ /gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs
95b6('dul ba): te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa chung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan
95b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa chung zad kyang byas pa med do/ /'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs
95b8('dul ba): 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig / des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi
96a1('dul ba): tshal brjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan
96a2('dul ba): 'das kyi thugs kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming thog mar smos par mdzad do/ /gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis
96a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis deng bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin du dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go/ /
96a4('dul ba): de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
96a5('dul ba): gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ shes ldan gau ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par
96a6('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che 'o zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /
96a7('dul ba): yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma
96a8('dul ba): bdag gis shes ldan gau ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che 'o zhes thos lags na/ gau ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag ci ga dge sbyong gau ta ma la skur pa
96b1('dul ba): 'debs pa ma lags sam/ thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/ shes ldan gau ta mas gsungs pa bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos smra ba lags sam/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ ci ga de dag gi drung
96b2('dul ba): du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa mchis na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden pa de nga la skur ba 'debs pa ma yin/
96b3('dul ba): thal bar smra ba ma yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ chos smra ba yin/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas
96b4('dul ba): su mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /shes ldan gau ta ma de skad gsungs mod kyi/ shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag yid mi ches
96b5('dul ba): lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kye gau ta ma re shig rgan zhing rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba
96b6('dul ba): can dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyis
96b7('dul ba): mi 'che ba lags na/ shes ldan gau ta ma 'khrungs nas ring po ma lags pa gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan
96b8('dul ba): par mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil
97a1('dul ba): gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po me chung ngu khyad du gsad par mi bya/ chung ngu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dge slong gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /
97a2('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces/ /bka' stsal nas ni bde gshegs kyi/ /de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ /ston
97a3('dul ba): pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs/ /rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang / /rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la/ /blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ /khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis/ /rgyal
97a4('dul ba): srid dag ni thob gyur nas/ /chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod/ /de bas de la shin du gdung / /de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /gal te
97a5('dul ba): grong ngam dgon pa 'ang rung / gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na/ /blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ /khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/ /'di ltar sbrul ni rgyu ba na/ /rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /glags rnyed nas ni gzhon nus kyang / /
97a6('dul ba): skyes pa bud med du ma zin/ /de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /mang po sreg cing 'bar byed pa/ /lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me/ /
97a7('dul ba): blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes/ /khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/ /me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang / /rkyen las chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /mes ni ring por mi thogs par/ /grong rdal dang ni grong khyer sreg /de ltas rang
97a8('dul ba): gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me/ /nags tshal sreg pa gang yin de/ /zhag 'das nas ni 'ga' zhig tu/ /
97b1('dul ba): 'dab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi/ /dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la/ /brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa/ /de la bu tsha yod min pas/ /bgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs
97b2('dul ba): rabs kyang 'chad/ /de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang / /de bzhin brang 'gro me dang ni/ /dge slong tshul
97b3('dul ba): khrims ldan de la/ /blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya/ /de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de la khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /de nas go sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom
97b4('dul ba): ldan 'das gyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu
97b5('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ /khyod kyi sras gyis bdud rtsi thob nas
97b6('dul ba): bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring ba rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo / gnyis pa btang ba dang / de yang de nyid du rab tu phyung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag
97b7('dul ba): de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab
97b8('dul ba): tu byung ngo snyam mo/ /sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon
98a1('dul ba): nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o/ /
98a2('dul ba): da ni kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchi ste bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
98a3('dul ba): gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug pa 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchi
98a4('dul ba): lags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/ /khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te/ /nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/ /rgyal ba ljon shing la bsdad na/ /
98a5('dul ba): da ni khyod kyi slob ma yi/ /yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur bas/ /gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan/ /gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na/ /bdag gi bu ni
98a6('dul ba): 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te/ /bu gcig yul mi 'bras bus yongs su spyad thob na/ /de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med/ /gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na/ /nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams
98a7('dul ba): ni/ /shin du che dang phan gdags zhes/ /khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni/ /khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na/ /bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la/ /thugs brtses rjes su zung mdzod de/ /gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad
98a8('dul ba): du gsol/ /zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis gnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol
98b1('dul ba): ba'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas klags so/ /klags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
98b2('dul ba): ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka 'dod do/ /'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal
98b3('dul ba): te mi bzhud dang / bdag gis mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing / /sred 'gags bkri ba yong ba ma yin
98b4('dul ba): pa'i/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing / /sred 'gags bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi
98b5('dul ba): rtsal mnga' de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing / /'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni
98b6('dul ba): gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing / /'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /lan la spobs
98b7('dul ba): pa med nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang la rig par bgyi'o/ /'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no/ /'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/
98b8('dul ba): rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin
99a1('dul ba): du gyis shig / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go/ /
99a2('dul ba): 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rab tu
99a3('dul ba): phyung shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te kun du spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/ 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya
99a4('dul ba): ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag go/ /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
99a5('dul ba): te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so/ /
99a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka song la khyod mod kho nas rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgo na sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /zhugs nas gal te nang du spyon cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas gal
99a7('dul ba): te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byed 'di 'dra 'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal
99a8('dul ba): po'i khab du yang gnas par mi bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes gleng na/ mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang
99b1('dul ba): du 'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/ byon no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ji srid cig na byon
99b2('dul ba): zhes 'dri na zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song shig /sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te/ /lha rnams bsams pas 'grub 'gyur
99b3('dul ba): zhing / /de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyis/ /sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub/ /bcom ldan 'das gyis 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char
99b4('dul ba): ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzod pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsrung nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang
99b5('dul ba): yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do/ /de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong shig /de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung ngam/
99b6('dul ba): des smras pa/ lha rab tu byung ngo / /khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas chos 'dul ba legs
99b7('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyi 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de bzhin du chu btsags rtsa ba dang 'bras bu
99b8('dul ba): brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang / dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongs su longs spyad do/ /rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo
100a1('dul ba): mtshar skyes te smras pa/ 'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra ba nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so/ /dper ji lta bu ri rab dang
100a2('dul ba): yungs 'bru bzhin no/ /rgyal mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/ /nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang
100a3('dul ba): 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char kas
100a4('dul ba): smras pa byon no/ /dus ji srid na dgung bdun lon na'o/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor byos shig /'char kas smras pa/
100a5('dul ba): lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do/ /rgyal pos smras pa gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin tshe dang
100a6('dul ba): ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu
100a7('dul ba): drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu chug shig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang
100a8('dul ba): phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom
100b1('dul ba): na khyod cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces sgo shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
100b2('dul ba): dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor
100b3('dul ba): grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom la 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs gyis bskor ba lta bu/
100b4('dul ba): glang po che glang po phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs
100b5('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan mgron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams
100b6('dul ba): kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor lo sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor
100b7('dul ba): ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor
100b8('dul ba): ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin
101a1('dul ba): du dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i
101a2('dul ba): 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
101a3('dul ba): gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi kar byon te/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang gyo mo dang gseg ma rnams bsal
101a4('dul ba): nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun phyang mang bo dpyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ka nas gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs
101a5('dul ba): shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go/ /de na 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do/ /kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do/ /kha cig ni khrus byed do/ /ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon
101a6('dul ba): nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab
101a7('dul ba): kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkya nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad
101a8('dul ba): grub pas bka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas ltogs po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas da zhabs kyis gshegs pa
101b1('dul ba): lta zhes ma dad pa skyed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang bzhengs pa dang bzhugs
101b2('dul ba): pa dang mnal ba mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po
101b3('dul ba): dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel gyi kha dog go/ /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston pa mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad de sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang
101b4('dul ba): mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus
101b5('dul ba): te ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/ /
101b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi
101b7('dul ba): srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams
101b8('dul ba): bzhi'i srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams
102a1('dul ba): mi gang lhag tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong rnams sa la 'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te
102a2('dul ba): rmongs par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras
102a3('dul ba): pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/ /'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed de nyid don ni kun du ston mdzad lags/ /'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs
102a4('dul ba): bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ /dri med gsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang da gzigs shig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad
102a5('dul ba): pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ /bltams pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang / /'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/ /de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis
102a6('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'thug pa mthong nas da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad
102a7('dul ba): ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa na sa chen po g.yos pa gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams
102a8('dul ba): cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin
102b1('dul ba): pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan
102b2('dul ba): 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so/ /gang gis tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na
102b3('dul ba): shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i
102b4('dul ba): bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i
102b5('dul ba): tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas bcom ldan 'das gyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so/ /de bas na 'di skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la
102b6('dul ba): 'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ /bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang / /'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o zhes smra 'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor
102b7('dul ba): brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs
102b8('dul ba): kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las/ /yab gyi khab na bzhugs pa las/ /dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnams su/ /ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang du ni/ /
103a1('dul ba): khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba/ /'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus/ /thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can/ /shin du bde ba bting ba yi/ /khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las/ /gding ba la ni ji
103a2('dul ba): ltar mnal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni/ /dga' ba byang chub yan lag ni/ /me tog bkram par chags med cing / /yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol
103a3('dul ba): pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/ gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ /rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/ /chab gyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med/ /bsod nams 'jug
103a4('dul ba): ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba/ dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi/ /tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus shing / /ka shi'i mchog gnas
103a5('dul ba): mdzes pa las/ /de dang bral na mdzes ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te/ /tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin/ /gser dang nor bu rna cha dag /rmongs skyed nga la ci zhig bya/ /rgyal pos gsol
103a6('dul ba): pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na/ /glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/ /tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la/ /zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang / /yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa
103a7('dul ba): yis/ /sa kun rnam par rgyu na yang / /nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i/ /na bza' mnabs na mdzes pa las/ /ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa/ /ji ltar khyod
103a8('dul ba): kyi sku yis bzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po nga yi gos ni ngo tsha shes/ /nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te/ /de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/ /nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar
103b1('dul ba): khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa las/ /du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las/ /'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni/ /phal ba gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs
103b2('dul ba): nas ni/ /nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i/ /nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi/ /'jig rten kun la brtse phyir nga spyod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/ /dgun skyems kha ra'i chab
103b3('dul ba): gsol na/ /rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/ /chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na/ /bdag la btung ba thams cad ni/ /dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa/ /chos kyi ro mchog nga btung ngo / /rgyal
103b4('dul ba): po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang / /khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs/ /da lta gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/ /blo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/ /bcom
103b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin te/ /dri ma bag chag bcas par ngas spangs pas/ /nga ni myang ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te/ /nga la 'di na 'jig pa cung zad med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
103b6('dul ba): gis gsol pa/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong bar/ /khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na/ /gcig po khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/ /thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
103b7('dul ba): rtsal pa/ gau tam chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa/ /tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ gang gis khyod ni
103b8('dul ba): khyad du gsod/ /gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye/ /yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye/ /zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis nga yi khyad gsod dang / /gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang / /gang
104a1('dul ba): las yid 'byung skyes pa dag / nyon cig khyod la bshad pa bya/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/ /gal te 'di gsum yod min na/ /nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/ /yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol
104a2('dul ba): pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba/ /legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs/ /khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ /ji lta bur yang ma gos so/ /de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/ /thub
104a3('dul ba): pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ /bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do
104a4('dul ba): snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri
104a5('dul ba): bdun stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/ /lha sbyin nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can/ sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas
104a6('dul ba): pas smras pa/ /gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed pa shes na bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig /de la shAkya rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu
104a7('dul ba): che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs pa bre bo zas la sogs pa
104a8('dul ba): shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/ /ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud
104b1('dul ba): rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/ /'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gi ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /
104b2('dul ba): kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig
104b3('dul ba): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig
104b4('dul ba): gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag kyang phal cher kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar
104b5('dul ba): bcas pas mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/ da lta ni mis mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi/ /char pas
104b6('dul ba): 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad do/ /mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin
104b7('dul ba): no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam pa las de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu
104b8('dul ba): che ba yin no snyam ste lhag par dga' bar gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go/ /rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba 'o/ /de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin du
105a1('dul ba): dga' ba yod kyis/ ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang / shin du dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang
105a2('dul ba): la soms shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi
105a3('dul ba): bu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so/ /btsun pa maud gal
105a4('dul ba): gyi bu chen po gang na bsams pa nyid la bzhugs shig / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las
105a5('dul ba): mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par
105a6('dul ba): byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang /
105a7('dul ba): leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go/ /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ /lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed la lus gyi stod
105a8('dul ba): nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi
105b1('dul ba): bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan
105b2('dul ba): 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang / /sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / /zag zad
105b3('dul ba): dgra bcom gang yin pa/ /thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu
105b4('dul ba): byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin du dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs
105b5('dul ba): na lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das
105b6('dul ba): kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das
105b7('dul ba): kyi dgongs pa mi shes na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig
105b8('dul ba): rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa
106a1('dul ba): la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig / kau shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las
106a2('dul ba): mnyan te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi na 'khod pa'i yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar phyogs
106a3('dul ba): na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub khor dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /
106a4('dul ba): byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya sbyin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas
106a5('dul ba): par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la
106a6('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor
106a7('dul ba): skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /yul 'khor
106a8('dul ba): skyong gis smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/
106b1('dul ba): bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas
106b2('dul ba): gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /mig mi bzangs
106b3('dul ba): gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo / /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
106b4('dul ba): bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug pa sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan
106b5('dul ba): 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de bdag gis blta 'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so/ /de nas
106b6('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na khrag dron mo skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod
106b7('dul ba): pas de la thabs shig bsham par bya 'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang / des na rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par
106b8('dul ba): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
107a1('dul ba): khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes
107a2('dul ba): bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la phas ma bgyis/ mas ma lags rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags
107a3('dul ba): sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyi ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags sdug pa dang / rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i
107a4('dul ba): ri bo dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go/ /yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa/ /dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang / /khyod kyis bdag la
107a5('dul ba): mdzad lags te/ /sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/ /drangs te mtho ris thar pa la/ /bsgrib mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/ /khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs/ /mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni/ /
107a6('dul ba): bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi/ /longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
107a7('dul ba): de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas
107a8('dul ba): gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/ zas
107b1('dul ba): dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig /ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so/ /gang gi gdugs la lags/ de ring kho na 'o/ /
