107b2('dul ba): bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang / lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /
107b3('dul ba): des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer
107b4('dul ba): cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /gal te de ltar gyur na da su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag /
107b5('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'
107b6('dul ba): ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la
107b7('dul ba): bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po zas
107b8('dul ba): gtsang gi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig
108a1('dul ba): nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ /rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
108a2('dul ba): kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad
108a3('dul ba): pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis/ /shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi/ /yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni/ /rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
108a4('dul ba): de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni
108a5('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na dka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs
108a6('dul ba): kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/ lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis
108a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/ des bsams pa/ shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/ de nas shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na
108a8('dul ba): cir 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci
108b1('dul ba): rab tu 'byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig /ci thams cad dam/ khyim re nas re re 'o/ /bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis
108b2('dul ba): khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/ /bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang / ming chen no/ /ming chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no/ /ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug
108b3('dul ba): nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /ming chen la mas smras pa/ /bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu
108b4('dul ba): byung shig / des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig /bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig /yum khyod
108b5('dul ba): gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod/ de ring de la chung zad kyang ma bskur dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po legs sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro/ /bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o/ /
108b6('dul ba): des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig /des de
108b7('dul ba): la khyer nas song ba dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shes pa la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya/
108b8('dul ba): de'i zan sbyar bar bya 'o zhes des rdze'u de rnams su sran tshod dang / tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang ngo / /ji tsam na mngag gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang / des smras pa/ bu mo 'o na ni ci yod/
109a1('dul ba): des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so/ /ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o zhes
109a2('dul ba): ci tsam na kha phye ba dang / bskyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so/ /de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring ba/ yum gdugs
109a3('dul ba): re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu sha stag bskur ba'i rigs so/ /des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ des ming chen la bstan nas/ bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags so/ /khyod la kho mos sngar bsod
109a4('dul ba): nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can mi skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes
109a5('dul ba): ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bas khas len du ma btub bo/ /de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na khyod ci
109a6('dul ba): rab tu 'byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug /des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs
109a7('dul ba): na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi thob bo/ /ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags
109a8('dul ba): 'thob bo/ /yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu legs kyis de bzhin
109b1('dul ba): du gyis shig / ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo / /de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi bang len te/ de pi bang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to/ /ma 'gags pa pi bang len pa la byang
109b2('dul ba): ba yin pas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgor bsdad de sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig /
109b3('dul ba): sgo srung song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/ lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog /shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong shig /
109b4('dul ba): de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po la byung nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa/ khyod 'ongs nas ji srid lon/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyod pi bang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa na'o/ /de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas des smras pa/ khyed pi
109b5('dul ba): bang len pa la byang ba yin no/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo
109b6('dul ba): bas de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste/ gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid tu gnas thob shig /de de nyid du gnas btab bo/ /mal 'cha' bas rims bag gi dri
109b7('dul ba): can gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang / de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su tshor nas smras pa/ ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod dam/ de rnams kyis brtag
109b8('dul ba): par brtsams pa na me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /ma 'gags pa mtshan mo mi bde bzhin nyal nas nam nangs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa ci ga bde bde bar gnyid log gam/
110a1('dul ba): des smras pa/ lha bde bar gnyid ma log go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog gi sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus gnad lags so/ /
110a2('dul ba): rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya/ mal 'cha' bas smras pa/ lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis rims
110a3('dul ba): bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya/ des smras pa/ lha bdag la tha ga pas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos thag pa bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos dbul/ tha ga pas smras pa/ lha snam bu 'thag
110a4('dul ba): pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri lags so/ /rgyal po
110a5('dul ba): mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te/
110a6('dul ba): de shAkya rnams la gnod par byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste/ de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo cag
110a7('dul ba): thams cad rab tu 'byung na khyod ci byed/ lha sbyin gyis bsams pa gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs cig bsham par bya ste bslu'o/ /gzhan yang
110a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/ ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang bya'o zhes bsams
110b1('dul ba): so snyam nas smras pa/ khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal pos tshig de
110b2('dul ba): glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung
110b3('dul ba): bar 'gyur gyis/ thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyed cig ces bsgo 'o/ /lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung ba shes par gyur
110b4('dul ba): dang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ nga ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam cis rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal
110b5('dul ba): srid bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas des grong khyer gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
110b6('dul ba): bsgreng / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/ shin du dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag /me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go/ /de nas shAkya brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo na seng
110b7('dul ba): ge'i khri la 'dug go/ /shAkya mo dang shAkya gzhon nu ma ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung khol ma can dang / skar khung dang / stegs bu dag la 'dug go/ /shAkya rnams kyi 'byor pa la blta bar 'dod pa'i skye bo'i tshogs yul sna tshogs
110b8('dul ba): nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che 'am/ tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su 'dug go/ /shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/ su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i phyir bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan
111a1('dul ba): dang / ltas mkhan dag bkug go/ /shAkya rnams do shal dang / gdub bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dag la bltas nas so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po
111a2('dul ba): bzang ldan sna la byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ re shig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba na de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams
111a3('dul ba): kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lha sbyin phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal
111a4('dul ba): ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ko ka li ka dang / khaN+Da s+dzas kyi dum du dra bya dang / ka Ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir byung ba dang bong bu'i skad grag nas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos
111a5('dul ba): chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te/ blangs so/ /de yang de rnams kyis lung
111a6('dul ba): bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams bskyed mos tshal du dus ston
111a7('dul ba): la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par
111a8('dul ba): 'gyur/ kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma yin pas ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams
111b1('dul ba): kyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu 'byung ba
111b2('dul ba): dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu
111b3('dul ba): 'byin pa na skra 'dreg par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'breg pa na de ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag la skad 'dzer cing dbugs brdzags par skra 'breg par byed do/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar
111b4('dul ba): 'khor ci'i phyir du/ de snying rje rje skad du bcom chung ngu dal bus tshig re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa mi phal pa rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig /
111b5('dul ba): khyed kyis spangs te gson pa bas ni 'gum mi bsdo'o/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te/ chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig /ngas ji ltar mi phal
111b6('dul ba): pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas des phyogs gcig tu ras shig bting nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig /'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag
111b7('dul ba): cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog shig / de rnams kyis se mo do dang / do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa
111b8('dul ba): rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so/ /nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang / des bsams pa/ re shig
112a1('dul ba): gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
112a2('dul ba): ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par
112a3('dul ba): bya ba zhig snyam mo/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas tshe
112a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nye bar 'khor
112a5('dul ba): khyod ci'i phyir shin du mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la
112a6('dul ba): bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang
112a7('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems khongs su
112a8('dul ba): chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa
112b1('dul ba): ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/ /rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad/ /'das nas yun rings lon pa yi/ /las rnams la ni rtog
112b2('dul ba): par mdzad/ /gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang / khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur
112b3('dul ba): ro/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ des khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
112b4('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal
112b5('dul ba): lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod
112b6('dul ba): cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag par lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen
112b7('dul ba): par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /
112b8('dul ba): sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rgan rabs ji lta bu bzhin du 'dud par byed pas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na/ nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/ /
113a1('dul ba): de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na/ ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang 'dud par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i
113a2('dul ba): phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa chog la thud cig /des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/
113a3('dul ba): ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na ni shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na ni byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na
113a4('dul ba): mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbu dma' bar gyur te/ de ltar thams cad kyis rim bzhin du gtugs so/ /lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis
113a5('dul ba): thud cig / des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis shes de 'dud du ma btub ste/ der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis bcag go/ /dge slong rnams the tsom
113a6('dul ba): skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa dang sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa la gzigs/
113a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos
113a8('dul ba): pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du bcug go/ /de'i tshe bA rA Na
113b1('dul ba): sI'i grong khyer na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i drung du bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' zhes bya ba song nas smras pa/ bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog /des smras pa/ khyod la kAr Sha pA Na lnga brgya yod dam/
113b2('dul ba): des smras pa med do/ /song la kAr Sha pA Na lnga brgya khyer te shog shig /de la 'byor pa med kyang de de la lhag par chags pas dus dus su me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs skyel bar byed pa dang / de de la sdug pa skyes so/ /ji tsam dus
113b3('dul ba): gzhan zhig na bA rA Na sIr dus ston byung nas bud med thams cad gos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas rang gi khyim na rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos gnas pa de bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dgas mthong nas yi chad par gyur te/
113b4('dul ba): smad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa/ de ring bA rA Na sI'i mi rnams gos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur na/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' su zhig dang dga'
113b5('dul ba): mgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems shing bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des de mthong ba dang / sngon gyi byas pa drin du gzo ba yid la bskyed nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u song la shin du dri
113b6('dul ba): zhim pa'i me tog dag khyer te shog shig / bdag cag lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ /de shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus nas song ngo / /de'i gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / g.yer ba'i yon
113b7('dul ba): tan brtags nas mos shing zhen pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log pas nam nangs pa dang mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin du lci bar gyur nas/ ji tsam nyi ma shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi dus ston gyi ched du me
113b8('dul ba): tog thams cad btus zin pa de'i tshe sad nas me tog gi ched du phan tshun song ba na ma rnyed nas/ des shing shiR+Sha zhes bya ba'i me tog cig khyer nas de'i drung du song ste tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ g.yang gzhi thogs pa bu pho mdzes dga' ni/ /
114a1('dul ba): ma sha phyed med rgyud gzhan snyom las kyis/ /de ring shing rnams me tog rgyas dus na/ /sbyin pa'i me tog shi R+Shad 'di yin no/ /des smras pa/ song la me tog gzhan dag khyer la shog shig /'dod pa rnams la so sor rten par byed pa
114a2('dul ba): ni kun du sbyor ba la sogs te/ de'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas so ka'i zla ba'i tha ma'i nyin par sprin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus na grong khyer nas shin du thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dag tu mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus
114a3('dul ba): ma dag dbyangs su len cing me tog thu'o/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dgas 'chor du chas pa na de nyi ma'i gzer rnon pos gdungs nas grib ma'i ched du phyogs der son pa dang / de'i glu'i sgra thos nas tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ steng
114a4('dul ba): nas nyi ma gdung byed cing / /'og nas bye mas gdungs pa la/ /glu len khyod kyi lus la ni/ /ci phyir nyi ma'i gdung ba med/ mdzes dga'as kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te/ /rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs
114a5('dul ba): lags/ /bya ba bya ba ma yin pas/ /'jig rten 'di gdungs nyi ma min/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te/ des na nyi ma phyed kyi tshe 'dug nas me
114a6('dul ba): tog thu'o snyam nas/ des bkug ste smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re shig bsil bar byed pa'i gtam dag byos shig mnyan to/ /des bsams pa/ rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa yin te/ des na 'di skad smra'o snyam nas/
114a7('dul ba): des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas rgyal po lus gdung ba dang bral bar gyur to/ /rgyal po mngon par dga' bar gyur nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas
114a8('dul ba): dbang bskur ba'i srog sbyin pa gang yin pa de la lan du phan ci gdags/ lha rgyal srid phyed kyis so/ /de nas rgyal po des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob cig dang / sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin no/ /de rgyal po'i
114b1('dul ba): pho brang du mal bzang po byin nas de de la nyal ba na bzang mo rjes su dran par sems shing rgyal srid phyed po de yang smad 'tshong bzang mo'i phyir blang ngo snyam mo/ /yang bsams pa/ rgyal srid phyed po de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal po de ci 'dra ba zhig /ma la
114b2('dul ba): bdag gis de srog dang dbral bar bya'o snyam mo/ /yang bsams pa/ rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya snyam nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ don ma grub na 'dod 'gyur la/ /don grub 'dod pa ldog mi 'gyur/ /ma grub na ni phongs
114b3('dul ba): gyur pas/ /de bas don ni don ma yin/ /ji tsam nam nangs su nye ba na de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal lo/ /nam nangs pa na rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u de khug shig /de la rgyal srid phyed sbyin no/ /
114b4('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho nya dag 'ongs pa na mal chen po nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ma dad pa bskyed de rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha 'di ni rgyal srid kyi 'os ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/
114b5('dul ba): ci'i phyir/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha nyon mongs mal chen po gya nom pa spangs te g.yang gzhi la bting nas mchis nyal ba'i dman pa la mos pa gang lags pa de rgyal srid stsal te ci rung / /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag shes rab can
114b6('dul ba): de de la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur gyis khug shig / de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze'i khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal chen po nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig
114b7('dul ba): par byas nas de nas smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te gal te khyod rab tu byung na khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs chung zad rtogs pa nga la brjod pa lta na gnang ngo / /des de bzhin du bgyi'o
114b8('dul ba): zhes khas blangs so/ /de nas des zhi ba'i phyogs su song nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub rtogs par byas nas rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal po de la sngon khas blangs pas song la/ khas blangs
115a1('dul ba): pa de rig par bya'o zhes de rgyal po'i drung du song nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis
115a2('dul ba): la gtugs te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ dge ba ci zhes btsal phyir rab byung ba'i/ /bram ze'i khye'u yis rnyed pa legs rnyed de/ /chung zad las kyi rnam smin bskyed pa yi/ /nyer 'gros khyad par chen po 'dir rtogs ltos/ /rgyal po
115a3('dul ba): tshangs sbyin gyi skra mkhan gang ga skyong zhes bya ba zhig yong ba de des mdzes dgas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa 'dzin du bcug nas smras pa/ gang ga skyong nga la tshigs su bcad pa de yang dang yang du dran par gyis shig /skra mkhan gang ga skyong
115a4('dul ba): rang gi bzo la shin du byang ba yin pas de gang gi tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin gi kha spu 'chos pa de'i tshe de gnyid log par 'gyur zhing se gol gyis sad par byas te/ sad nas kyang gang ga skyong la mchog gang 'dod pa gsol cig ces mchog
115a5('dul ba): sbyin par byed pa na des smras pa/ lha gsol ba zhig mchis so/ /gang gi tshe gang ga skyong gis rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa dran par byed pa de'i tshe rgyal po 'dod pa'i gtam la sems kyang mi 'gro na 'dod pa la zhen cing spyod pa lta smos kyang ci
115a6('dul ba): dgos te/ btsun mo la blta bar yang mi byed do/ /btsun mo rnams nyon mongs pas myos shing zhen nas gang ga skyong la smras pa/ zhang po gang gi tshe rgyal po khyod la lhas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa de'i tshe lha gal te bdag la dgyes na
115a7('dul ba): tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don rgyas par bshad du gsol cig / rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa de'i don rgyas par rnam par bkrol ba dang / de skyo ba skyes nas rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyis
115a8('dul ba): lags kyis khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te rab tu byung nas yon tan gyi tshogs chung zad rnyed na nga la rig par byos shig /des smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o/ /
115b1('dul ba): de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin la sngon khas blangs kyis song la khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o/ /snyam nas/
115b2('dul ba): des rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la
115b3('dul ba): myur du sems gtod pa yin pas des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/ rtogs so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis drang srong gang ga skyong gi rkang pa la gtugs pas sa rnam pa
115b4('dul ba): drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs sbyin blo dang ldan pa po/ /'di ru 'breg mkhan lag cha dag /bzhag nas rab tu byung 'di la/ /lha khyod 'dud pa'i tshul ma yin/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi
115b5('dul ba): mas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di ltar thub pas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la/ /des ni dka' spyad 'di dag spyad lags te/ /blo rgya chen por gyur pa gang lags pa/ /gang ga skyong la chung zad ma gsung shig /
115b6('dul ba): dka' thub zil gyis sdig pa thams cad mnan/ /dka' thub zil gyis 'jig rten thams cad mnan/ /dka' thub zil gyis 'breg mkhan snod bcom ste/ /dka' thub 'bar la chung zad ma gsung shig /dge slong dag ji snyam du
115b7('dul ba): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de bzang ldan 'di nyid yin no/ /drang srong gang ga skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'khor 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan tshangs
115b8('dul ba): sbyin du gyur pa na nye bar 'khor drang srong gang ga skyong zhes bya bar gyur pa la phyag byas pa na sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /da ltar yang bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor rab tu byung ba la phyag byas pa na sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// //
116a1('dul ba): sdom la kau Di n+ya dang ril ba'i dbyibs/ /thams cad skyob nor shing rta dang / /gdums dang srin bu ki ta ka /byams pa'i dril sgrogs bcug pa dang / /dga' skyong la tu btung ba dang / /snum khur gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can/ /
116a2('dul ba): 'dul ba 'dzin mchog bgrangs pa'o/ /gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+yas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa
116a3('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na des na bcom ldan
116a4('dul ba): 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong kun shes kau Di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/
116a5('dul ba): 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas dge slong kau Di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/
116a6('dul ba): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam pa smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba
116a7('dul ba): dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /
116a8('dul ba): 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
116b1('dul ba): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sIr nye bar brten nas ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs zhes bya ba la
116b2('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams te/ bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / dge 'dun lnga brgya tsam
116b3('dul ba): dong ba'i dge 'dun de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa 'od zer nyi ma
116b4('dul ba): stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu dad pa bskyed nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di las rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis de ltar
116b5('dul ba): gros byas pa las kha cig ni rgya mtsho chan por zhugs so/ /kha cig ni yul gyi mthar dong ngo / /kha cig ni shi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur te/ skye bo bcu drug zhig lus pa de rnams ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
116b6('dul ba): srung las rab tu byung ste/ de rnams de na bsam gtan dang / klog pa dang / rnal 'byor gyis gnas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas shing zad pa'i
116b7('dul ba): me bzhin du drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags su phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de rnams la lha rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
116b8('dul ba): yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de ring du zhag bdun lon te/ de'i bstan pa yang nub na khyed cag 'bras bu med pa'i sbun pa 'bru zhing 'dug ste/ ci rung zhes byas pa thos nas bya ba ma byas pa'i sdug bsngal
117a1('dul ba): chen pos gdungs so/ /de nas lnga ni thos ma thag tu ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs las babs nas bA rA Na sIr zhugs so/ /drug gis ni de nyid du yid byung bas brtson 'grus brtsams nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /phyi nas
117a2('dul ba): lnga yang babs nas bA rA Na sI nyid du 'jug par brtsams pa na ji tsam na shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dag 'gro ba na shing rtas 'tsho ba cig gi glang dag nyam chung bzhin du de dag la des lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nas yang du gzhus te/ de rnams
117a3('dul ba): nyam chung bas shi la thug cing 'gro mi nus bzhin du shing rtas 'tsho ba'i sna la 'gro ba dang / de la dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye shing rtas 'tsho ba khyod kyi glang nyam chung ba 'di rnams la lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nas yang du gzhus te
117a4('dul ba): ci rung / gal te 'gro mi nus na dal bus 'gror chug la phyi nas song ngo cog /des smras pa/ bdag sna la shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dang lhan cig mchi mi nus shes gal te bdag phyi nas chas na gdon mi za bar shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa 'dis
117a5('dul ba): bdag bor nas dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis shing rtas 'tsho ba de las bzur bzur nas mi dga' ste/ gcig la gcig smras pa/ shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das te bdag
117a6('dul ba): cag lus na 'dis kyang bdag cag la skul ma btab kyis/ ma la bdag cag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thub pa chen po 'od srung gi/ /gal te chos ni nub gyur kyang / /yang dag (par )sangs rgyas
117a7('dul ba): kyis bshad pa'i/ /brtson 'grus 'dor bar mi bya'o/ /bdag cag gi ni zag pa yang / /gal te zad par ma gyur na/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/ /nyan thos mchog tu 'gyur bar bya/ /de rnams bA rA Na sIr zhugs nas bsod snyoms spyad de slar
117a8('dul ba): yang ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas bsam gtan dang / klog pa dang / rnal 'byor gyis gnas pa na de rnams las bzhi shi'o/ /gcig cig lus pa de mi dga' ba skyes shing yid byung bas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs
117b1('dul ba): gang yin pa 'di nyid la bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byas la de'i dge slong nyi khri yang mthong na/ bdag 'ba' zhig 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lta zhig
117b2('dul ba): snyam nas/ des smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las 'di srid du tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs chung zad kyang ma rtogs kyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag
117b3('dul ba): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bra ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
117b4('dul ba): shAkya thub par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa las bdag rab tu byung nas/ der thog mar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des bdag snam sbyar gyis rgyal
117b5('dul ba): mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong
117b6('dul ba): nyi khri yod pa las dge slong gcig lus pas 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan bzung ste/ ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang na ba der song nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun shes kau Di n+ya 'di nyid yin te/
117b7('dul ba): de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin
117b8('dul ba): la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams
118a1('dul ba): la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kau Di n+ya la chos bshad nas yang dang yang du rmed par mdzad de/ kau Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/
118a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so/ /kau Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so zhes gsol pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
118a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad nas yang dang yang du rmed pa mdzad de/ kau Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom
118a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so/ /kau Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so zhes gsol lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong kau Di n+ya 'di nyid kyis
118a5('dul ba): las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du 'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sIr rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /
118a6('dul ba): rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/
118a7('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag gi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas
118a8('dul ba): so/ /btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u yi ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha yul dbus kyi yul chos kyis ni gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa lags
118b1('dul ba): na de mdzes dga' zhes 'dogs lags la/ khye'u 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug cing yul ka shi'i rgyal po'i sras kyang lags pas khye'u 'i ming ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes de'i ming ka shi
118b2('dul ba): mdzes dga' zhes bya bar btags so/ /khye'u ka shi mdzes dga' ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la rjes
118b3('dul ba): su gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par
118b4('dul ba): byed do/ /yang rgyal po rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u zhig btsas te/ gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la bA rA Na sIr yul
118b5('dul ba): mi dang grong mi 'thab mo chen po byung ngo / /de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u yi ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /btsun mo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ lha 'di btsas pa na bA rA Na sIr grong mi dang yul mi
118b6('dul ba): rnams 'thab mo chen po byung bas de'i slad du khye'u yi ming 'thab mo skyes su gdags so zhes btags so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin ni chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dgas pha chos dang chos
118b7('dul ba): ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang yab 'das na rgyal por 'gyur zhing bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur
118b8('dul ba): gyis/ ma la bdag khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas de pha'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ yab gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags so/ /
119a1('dul ba): des smras pa/ bu gang gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par byed/ sbyin sreg sreg par byed/ dka' thub kyis gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs na ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung / des tshigs su bcad pas
119a2('dul ba): smras pa/ nags na shing shun rtswa gyon zhing / /rtsa ba 'bras bu 'cha' ba dang / /ri dgas gdug pa rnams dang ni/ /lhan cig gnas pa mchog lags kyi/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jig byed pa'i/ /mkhas pas rgyal srid slad du ni/ /
119a3('dul ba): gsod dang bcing dang rdeg pa dag /bgyid pa de lta ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu shes par gyis shig /khyod ni nga'i bu gcig pa sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun pa med pa yin te/ nga shi bar gyur na mi 'dod bzhin
119a4('dul ba): du khyod dang 'bral grang / gson bzhin du lta ga la btang / gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dgas smras pa/ yab gal te gnang na de lta na legs/ gal te mi gnang na 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/ phyag yang mi 'tshal lo/ /de na gzhon nu ka shi
119a5('dul ba): mdzes dgas nyi ma gcig kyang zan gcad pa byas pa nas/ gnyis dang / gsum pa dang / drug gi bar du zan gcad pa byas so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu gzhon nu
119a6('dul ba): shes par gyis shig / tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/ /rab tu dben par bya dka'o/ /gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar bya dka'o/ /gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod ri drung dang bas mtha' dag tu gnas pas mnags dka'o/ /
119a7('dul ba): gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ri dgas gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bya dgos so/ /
119a8('dul ba): khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dag las dben par bya dgos so/ /bu gzhon nu khyod tshur shog /'di nyid du 'dug la rgyal tshab
119b1('dul ba): byos te 'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig / sbyin bdag kyang byin cig /bsod nams dag kyang byos shig /de skad ces smras kyang gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smra'o/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo dang / blon po dang / mdun na
119b2('dul ba): 'don la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag re shig gzhon nu slong shig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes btsun mo dang / blon po dang / mdun na 'don rnams gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes
119b3('dul ba): dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sras gzhon nu mkhyen par mdzod cig /khyod ni shin du gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pas sdug bsngal mi mkhyen te/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/ /rab tu dben par bgyi dka'o/ /gcig pu nyid la mngon
119b4('dul ba): pa dga' bar bgyi dka'o/ /gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod ri drung dang / bas mtha' dag tu gnas pas mnags dka'o/ /gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ri dgas gdug pa
119b5('dul ba): dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i
119b6('dul ba): bar du mi'i dga' ba'i rtsed mo rnams las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/ /sras gzhon nu khyod tshur spyon/ 'di nyid du bzhugs la rgyal tshab mdzod de/ 'dod pa rnams la yang yongs su spyod cig /sbyin pa dag kyang stsol cig /bsod nams
119b7('dul ba): dag kyang gyis shig ces de skad smras pa na/ gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' dang lhan cig rdul khrod na rtse rtse ba'i blon po'i bu rnams dang /
119b8('dul ba): mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang / gzhan yang gzhon nu rnams la bsgo ba/ gzhon nu dag tshur re shig gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' slong shig /de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang / mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang / gzhon nu
120a1('dul ba): rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan na/ gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu des pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /khyod
120a2('dul ba): ni shin du gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pas sdug bsngal mi mkhyen te/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/ /rab tu dben par bgyi dka'o/ /gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka'o/ /gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod ri drung
120a3('dul ba): dang / bas mtha' dag tu gnas pas mnags dka'o/ /gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ri dgas gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi 'tshal lo/ khyod kyis ji srid
120a4('dul ba): 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba'i rtsed mo dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal
120a5('dul ba): lo/ /sras gzhon nu khyod tshur spyon/ 'di nyid du bzhugs la rgyal tshab mdzod de/ 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig /sbyin pa dag kyang stsol cig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces smras pa na/ gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi
120a6('dul ba): smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang / mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang / gzhon nu rnams rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzod cig /gzhon nu
120a7('dul ba): des pa ka shi mdzes dga' gum na ci rung / 'di ltar rab tu byung ba ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa lags te/ gal te de la mngon par dga' bar gyur na gson por de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te mngon par dga' bar ma gyur te/
120a8('dul ba): slar yang drang srong rnams las log par gyur na bu'i gnas ni pha dang ma ma lags pa gzhan gang du mchi bar 'gyur/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu dag gal te de lta na gnang ba bya'o/ /de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang /
120b1('dul ba): mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang / gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad smras so/ /gzhon nu des pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /rab tu 'byung bar gnang ste gzhon nu da ni de'i dus
120b2('dul ba): mkhyen par mdzod cig / de nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' bcud kyi khu ba'i rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang / stobs dang / /brtson 'grus bskyed de bA rA Na sI nas byung nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / 'bad pa
120b3('dul ba): dang / brtsal ba byas pas 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byas nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ de shin du sems can rnams la brtse ba dang ldan par gyur nas/ de'i byams pa des ni ri dgas gdug pa rnams kyang bsti
120b4('dul ba): gnas su 'dris par gyur te/ gnod pa mi bya bas de'i ming bzod pa smra ba bzod pa smra ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin shi nas 'thab mo skyes rgyal srid la bzhag ste/ de chos dang chos ma yin pas
120b5('dul ba): rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /drang srong bzod pa smra bas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gi lus ni kha zas dang btung bas bskyed pas dgon pa'i sman gyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis grong mthar gnas su mchi lags so/ /des smras pa/ bu grong
120b6('dul ba): ngam dgon par gnas kyang rung ste/ drang srong rnams ni dbang po rnams srung bar byed kyis/ song la bA rA Na sI'i nye 'khor du song nas lo ma dang 'dab ma'i spyil bu byos la gnas par gyis shig /de mkhan po las lung thob nas bA rA Na sIr
120b7('dul ba): song ste/ zhi ba'i gnas btsal ba'i phyir phan tshun du rgyu zhing rim gyis pha'i bskyed mos tshal du song ste/ des der btsal ba las zhi ba'i phyogs shig mthong nas de de na gnas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'thab mo skyes so ga'i
120b8('dul ba): dus la bab pa na nags tshang tshing me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams kyang skad 'byin pa'i bskyed mos tshal gyi sa gzhir btsun mo dang
121a1('dul ba): lhan cig dong nas des bskyed mos tshal der bde ba nyams su myong bas dub par gyur te gnyid log pa dang / bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas bskyed mos tshal de nyid nas phan tshun du rgyu bar brtsams pa las/
121a2('dul ba): ci tsam na drang srong bzod pa smra ba spyod lam zhi bas mtha' gcig na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bla mar bya ba'i sems bskyed nas drang srong de la phyag byas te bskor nas 'khod do/ /drang srong bzod pa smra bas bud med rnams mthong
121a3('dul ba): nas lhag par spyod lam zhi bas chos bshad par brtsams so/ /ji tsam na rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gnyid kyi snyoms pas dub pa las sangs pa na/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med ma mthong nas/ des ral gri blangs te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud
121a4('dul ba): med btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na drang srong bzod pa smra ba bskor nas 'khod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phrag dog bskyed de/ bdag nyid khros pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i rang bzhin gyis drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang / btsun mo'i
121a5('dul ba): tshogs kyis de khros pa'i gnas skabs mthong nas skrag ste byer ro/ /rgyal po snyems pa can gyis bzod pa smra ba la smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod su zhig des smras pa/ bzod pa smra ba 'o/ /rgyal po 'thab mo skyes kyis smras pa/ kho bo 'khrugs pa
121a6('dul ba): la yang bzod pa smra bar bdag nyid khas 'che ba yin nam/ da ni khyod bzod pa smra ba yin nam ma yin shes par bya'o zhes des de'i lag pa gnyis bcad nas yang dris pa/ khyod su yin/ des smras pa/ bzod pa smra ba 'o/ /des de'i rkang
121a7('dul ba): pa bcad cing yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang bcad pa dang / des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gal te bdag gi lus la ni/ /til 'bru tsam du gtub pa yi/ /lus ni phye ma brgyar gtubs nas/ /sa la gtor kyang bzod mi spong / /
121a8('dul ba): gang phyir bdag gis byams dge ba'i/ /sems ni rtag tu goms byas pas/ /bu sdug lta bu'i skye bo la/ /bzod pa de gtong spro ba med/ /ces tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs de lta bus tshor ba bsal nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/
121b1('dul ba): ji ltar rgyal po 'di nyon mongs pa la zhen pa'i blos bdag la yang dang yang du rmas nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs pa de bzhin du bdag bzod pa dang des pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid kyi nyon mongs
121b2('dul ba): pa'i tshogs rnams bcom nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ de la shes rab kyi ral gris yang dang yang du rmed cing thog mar de'i nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab bo/ /de nas
121b3('dul ba): bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pas bsams pa/ rgyal po sdig can 'dis drang srong 'di nyes pa med cing gnod pa ma byas par rkang pa dang lag pa dang phral te bor gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag gis 'di la gnod par bya 'o snyam
121b4('dul ba): du rig nas khro ba drag po'i kun nas dkris pas bzod pa smra ba'i mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ 'thab skyes bu dang bu mor bcas/ /gnyen gyi tshogs bcas grong khyer dang / /ljongs bcas 'jig rten 'tsho ba kun/ /thal
121b5('dul ba): bar bgyi yis bka' stsol cig / des slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gis bdag lus lag pa rkang pa dang / /sna dang phral nas ma rung byas gyur pa/ /de la 'ang sdig pa cung zad mi 'dod na/ /nyes med 'gro ba rnams la smos ci
121b6('dul ba): dgos/ /de nas bA rA Na sI'i lha gang yin pa des yams kyi nad dang / byi ba dang / bye ba dang / ne tso rnams btang zhing lhas char ma phab pas skye bo'i tshogs rnams shi bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/
121b7('dul ba): shes ldan dag ci'i phyir lha char mi 'bebs shing byi ba dang / bye ba dang / ne tso rnams rab tu mang por gyur la skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang shi bar gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha dang drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad
121b8('dul ba): pa'i lha gang lags pa'i lha de rab tu 'khrugs te/ de 'khrugs pas des yams kyi nad 'di btang lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/
122a1('dul ba): lha gtor ma dang / me tog phreng dang / yo byad rnams kyis lha rab tu 'khrugs pa mnyes par 'gyur bas gtor ma dang / me tog phreng dang / yo byad rnams sbyar la lha dang drang srong de la yang bzod pa gsol bar bgyi 'o/ /
122a2('dul ba): de nas rgyal pos bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /bskyed mos tshal na gnas pa'i lha drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa des yams kyi nad btang zhing des
122a3('dul ba): char mi 'bebs pa dang / byi ba dang / bye ba dang / ne tso rnams rab tu mang por byas te skye bo'i tshogs kyang shi bar gyur gyis/ yams kyi nad de nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khyed cag sang gtor ma dang / me tog phreng dang / yo byad rnams dang chas
122a4('dul ba): te bskyed mos tshal der deng la mchod pa byos shig / skye bo'i tshogs kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtor ma dang / me tog phreng dang / yo byad rnams sta gon byas te bskyed mos tshal der rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang lhan cig tu dong ngo / /de nas skye
122a5('dul ba): bo'i tshogs chen pos lha de la brten nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin nas lha'i gnas su mchod pa chen po byas te lha de la yang bzod par gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po drang srong bzod
122a6('dul ba): pa smra ba'i drung du song nas rkang pa la gtugs te bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa/ drang srong chen po bdag gis yul zhig la lhag par zhen pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa'i blo gros kyis khyod la gnod pa bgyis pa bzod par gsol
122a7('dul ba): lo/ /bzod pa smra bas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bzod do/ /sus 'tshal/ /des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ lus la mtshon gyis 'debs pa na 'ang / /bdag ni sems can kun la byams/ /gal te khyod yid mi ches na/ /
122a8('dul ba): bdag gi khrag 'dzag pa la ltos/ /de'i khrag 'o ma'i thigs par 'dzag pa'i cho 'phrul rgyal po sdig pa'i las byed pa de la bstan na/ 'on kyang yid ches par ma gyur nas des yang smras pa/ drang srong chen po bzod par gsol lo/ /rgyal po
122b1('dul ba): chen po bzod do/ /sus 'tshal/ des nas byang chub sems dpas yan lag dang nying lag gtubs pa'i gnas rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas bden pa gsol ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyis bdag gi
122b2('dul ba): lus/ /gtubs kyang shin du phra ba yi/ /zhe sdang 'di ltar yod min na/ /bdag lus ji ltar sngon bzhin shog /des bden pa'i tshig gsol bas lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po ya mtshan gyis mig phye nas
122b3('dul ba): tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ kye ma'o chos la legs gnas pas/ /kye ma brtul zhugs 'di grub ste/ /lus la gtub par byed pa na/ /khyod la mi dga' ci yang med/ /rgyal po 'thab mo skyes btsun mo dang / blon po dang / grong mi
122b4('dul ba): dang / yul mi dang bcas pas drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bzod pa smra ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gang yin pa de ni dge slong
122b5('dul ba): kau di n+ya 'di nyid yin te/ ngas de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing smon lam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis de la yang nas yang du rmed cing nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab pa'i smon lam gang yin pa de'i dbang gis/ da ltar
122b6('dul ba): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos bshad nas yang nas yang su smras so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab
122b7('dul ba): par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs
122b8('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus te bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
123a1('dul ba): dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams tshong pa brgyad khrir gyur pa na zang zing gis yang dag par bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod pa
123a2('dul ba): de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba ded dpon gnyis shig byung ste/ thams cad skyob dang / legs grub ces bya ste/ re re la yang tshong pa'i 'khor bzhi khri bzhi khri yod do/ /de la legs grub nges par 'byung ba la mngon par dga'
123a3('dul ba): nas de drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ des mtha' gcig tu brtson 'grus la gnas nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de'i tshong pa de rnams ded dpon ma mthong nas phan tshun du
123a4('dul ba): btsal bar brtsams pa na/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du ma rnyed pa de'i tshe ded dpon thams cad skyob kyi drung du dong nas smras pa/ ded dpon ded dpon des ni bdag cag la ma bltas par mchis te/ bdag cag gis btsal na yang
123a5('dul ba): ma rnyed na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ des smras pa/ yi slong bar ma byed par 'khod cig ded dpon de btsal lo/ /de nas ded dpon thams cad skyob tshong pa brgyad khris yongs su bskor nas/ ded dpon legs grub bskyed
123a6('dul ba): mos tshal dang / 'dug gnas dang / dka' thub kyi nags su btsal bar brtsams pa na des de mthong nas dris pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa rnams spangs te rab tu byung / bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos 'chad
123a7('dul ba): kyis/ ngag gis ma yin pas ded dpon 'khor dang bcas pa de la 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul gyis dad par byas so/ /des tshong pa brgyad khri po de zang zing gis bsdu bas bsdus nas
123a8('dul ba): smras pa/ 'di'i phyir bya ba byos shig /'di la bya ba byas na gdon mi za bar 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis de la bya ba rnam pa du ma byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon thams
123b1('dul ba): cad skyob gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /tshong pa brgyad khri po gang yin pa de dag ni lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas zang zing gis nye bar bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod do/ /
123b2('dul ba): 'di dag da ltar yang ngas chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus nas bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu
123b3('dul ba): dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa na gcig tu dkar ba yin la/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas zhes bya ba nas dge slong khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
123b4('dul ba): lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams bgo bsha' mdzad nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong
123b5('dul ba): rnams the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te dam pa'i chos kyi ros
123b6('dul ba): tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug dang bral zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
123b7('dul ba): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas lnga sde'i
123b8('dul ba): dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas shing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba
124a1('dul ba): dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol te/ ded dpon du gyur pa na lnga po dag 'brog dgon pa'i lam du chu med pas srog dang bral
124a2('dul ba): ba'i sdug bsngal dog pa nyam nga ba thob pa na lha rnams la bden pa gsol nas dbang phyug chen pos char phab pa'i chus tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba ded dpon thams cad skyob ces bya ba tshong pa lnga brgya
124a3('dul ba): dang lhan cig tu tshong byed cing 'brog dgon pa'i lam chu chung ba zhig tu zhugs nas rim gyis 'bigs byed ces bya ba'i dgon par phyin pa dang / tshong pa de rnams der chu thams cad kyi thams cad du zad nas chu dang bral yang mnags te dong ba
124a4('dul ba): las/ tshong pa lnga tsam chu ma rnyed pas lhag par yi slong bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag ded dpon thams cad skyob kyis mthong nas snying rjes sems bskyod pas kha gyen du bltas te lha rnams la gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/ zhi ba dang /
124a5('dul ba): chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab 'jug la sogs pa lha shes ldan dag gson cig /bdag sems can rnams la mnyam par sems pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis dbang phyug chen po'i
124a6('dul ba): lhas char 'bebs par gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g.yos pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/ su zhig gis dbang
124a7('dul ba): phyug chen po'i gnas g.yos par byas snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin par mthong nas des dbang phyug chen po'i char gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag bab ste/ des tshong pa de rnams tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa'i lam nas bsgral
124a8('dul ba): to/ /dge slong de ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon thams cad skyob gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /tshong pa lnga po chu dang bral bas lhag par yi blong bar gyur pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag yin te/ de na yang ngas 'di dag chus tshim
124b1('dul ba): par byas nas 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral to/ /da ltar yang ngas 'di dag dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i
124b2('dul ba): 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
124b3('dul ba): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
124b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug dang bral zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
124b5('dul ba): 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/ dbang po dang /
124b6('dul ba): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas shing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
124b7('dul ba): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol te/ ded dpon du gyur pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang nas 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te rin
124b8('dul ba): po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba na ded dpon nor gyi shing rta zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de tshong pa lnga zhig dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por dong ba na de rnams dang ded dpon des phan
125a1('dul ba): tshun bshes pa'i gtam smra bar byed pas mdza' bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin nas gru so so sta gon byas nas 'jug pa'i tshe de rnams kyis ded dpon nor gyi shing rta la smras pa/ ded dpon bdag
125a2('dul ba): cag ni khyod dang bral na dga' bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na 'dir zhugs shig dang gru dor ro/ /de rnams der zhugs pa dang rlung langs nas skrag par gyur to/ /nor gyi shing rtas smras pa/ shes ldan dag ma 'jigs
125a3('dul ba): shig / gang gi tshe gru zhig par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi mgul du 'jus shig dang / bdag gis khyed cag gdon to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas des ni rin po che chen
125a4('dul ba): po la 'os pa dag mchan khung du btags nas gru zhig pa na de rnams ded dpon de'i mgul du 'jus nas/ des de rnams lus dub cing srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin par byas so/ /de rnams skam la phyin te
125a5('dul ba): de btang ba dang / de dbugs gtan chad nas shi'o/ /de rnams kyis de chu nas skam la phyung ba dang / ji tsam na mchan khung na rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mthong nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i
125a6('dul ba): tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon nor gyi shing rta gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /tshong pa de rnams ni dge slong lnga po 'di dag nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas so/ /da ltar
125a7('dul ba): ngas 'di dag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa/ yang gang gi
125a8('dul ba): tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya rgan pa'i dang la 'dug pa de'i tshe 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te 'dug go/ /dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang
125b1('dul ba): ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor la gdugs lta bur bgyis te mchis lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong kun shes kau Di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing
125b2('dul ba): bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag sdums byed ces bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs
125b3('dul ba): spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang /
125b4('dul ba): bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa las ji tsam na ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes bstan to/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril
125b5('dul ba): sgrogs su bcug pa/ nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong mi dag nyon cig /ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes bstan gyis/ de la khyed cag las lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa
125b6('dul ba): de dag ni nga'i yul na gnas par gyis shig / gzhan ni phyogs sna tshogs su deng la lo bcu gnyis 'das nas slar shog shig /de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis mngan la smras pa/ kye nang rje bang mdzod na bdag 'khor dang bcas
125b7('dul ba): pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang btung ba dag yod dam/ des smras pa/ dpon po mchis so/ /de nas khyim bdag sdums byed 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'dug go/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni kun du dong ngo / /mu ge chen po nyam nga ba/
125b8('dul ba): dgon pa slongs mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ba la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/ bas mtha'i gnas mal brten pa/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas
126a1('dul ba): gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i tshe bA rA Na sI dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas zhig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so/ /gang gi tshe mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs su rung bas skye bo'i
126a2('dul ba): tshogs skrag nas kun du dong ba de'i tshe de rnams kyi bsod snyoms chad nas de dag thams cad 'dus te khyim bdag sdums byed gang na ba der dong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms
126a3('dul ba): rgyun du sbyor ram/ des smras pa/ mngan la rmas te bgyi'o zhes des mngan byed pa'i mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag cag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza'
126a4('dul ba): ba dang btung ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ dpon po mchis so/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so/ /khyim bdag sdums byed kyis rab tu byung ba lnga brgya'i bsod snyoms sbyar to zhes rang sangs rgyas
126a5('dul ba): lnga brgya gzhan dag gis thos nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyi drung du dong ste phyin nas khyim bdag sdums byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms kun du sbyor ram/ des
126a6('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa dag phul lags bzhin du yang bslang ci 'tshal/ khyim bdag de rnams kyang gzhan yin la bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na mngan la smras te bgyi'o zhes des
126a7('dul ba): mngan byed pa'i mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag cag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba stong po gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ dpon po mchis so/ /
126a8('dul ba): der rang sangs rgyas de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa rnams bzhugs shig khyed kyi gdugs tshod kyi dus gang lags/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag nyi ma phyed ma yol bar ro/ /de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis sbyin
126b1('dul ba): gtong gi khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas sbyin gtong gi zhal ta byed pa'i mi dang dus tshod sbron pa yang bzhag nas de rnams nyi ma re re zhing lhags nas zas kyi bya ba byed do/ /dgra bcom pa stong po de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa
126b2('dul ba): de lhag par mdzes pa mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pas 'khor de la gdugs ltar byas te gnas so/ /khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mos dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan de'i mgo gdugs ltar 'dug cing kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
126b3('dul ba): par mthong nas kyang lhag par dad pa skyes so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dro la bab pa dang lhas char dbab par brtsams so/ /de nas bu mo des dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi spyi bor gdugs bzung nas zan zos zin pa dang /
126b4('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar 'phags pa 'di yon tan gyi tshogs ci 'dra ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thob pas 'di 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas pa de bzhin du bdag
126b5('dul ba): kyang 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mo gang yin pa de dge slong kun shes kau Di n+ya 'di nyid yin te/ de na 'di gzhon nu
126b6('dul ba): mar gyur pa na rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gdugs bzung nas smon lam du yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob nas 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur ces btab bo/ /des na da ltar
126b7('dul ba): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas kyang 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu
126b8('dul ba): gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag de lta bu la khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la brten nas lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi
127a1('dul ba): ros tshim par mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya las brten nas
127a2('dul ba): lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang gi phyir da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug dang bral zhing /
127a3('dul ba): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad
127a4('dul ba): mkhyen te ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas kun shes kau Di n+ya la brten te lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang
127a5('dul ba): bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas shing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs
127a6('dul ba): su ma grol te/ dud 'gro byol song gi lus su skyes pa na/ kau Di n+ya srin bu ki ta kar gyur pa la brten nas srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri rang gi shas tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba
127a7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas te rgya mtsho chan po'i rus sbal rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de rnams kyi gtso bo gyur to/ /ji tsam na tshong pa lnga brgya rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rgya mtsho chen
127a8('dul ba): por zhugs te/ de nas rin po che sna tshogs blangs nas slar log pa las 'di ltar gru bo che chu srin nya'i rigs kyi tshan gyis phug ste/ de na ku co chen po byung ba'i sgra de rus sbal gyis thos nas rgya mtsho chen po nas
127b1('dul ba): langs te/ de de rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bag tsha ba bor la kho bo'i rgyab tu zhon cig dang kho bos bsgral bar bya'o/ /de nas tshong pa de rnams shi ba las sos pa bzhin du thams cad rus sbal
127b2('dul ba): gyi rgyab tu zhon te/ des de rnams khyer nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyogs te chas pa na khur gyis shin du btsir kyang brtson 'grus la gnas shing snyom pa ma bskyed de/ de lus dub pas de rnams legs par bsgral
127b3('dul ba): te mgrin pa brkyang nas gnyid log go/ /de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na srin bu ki ta ka rnams kyi tshang yod pas de nas ki ta ka gcig rgyu zhing song ba na dri tshor te de'i drung du song ba dang / de nas lus chen po de gnyid log par
127b4('dul ba): mthong nas rings pa'i 'gros kyis srin bu ki ta ka'i tshang du son te/ rang rang gi brdas ki ta ka rnams la go bar byas nas srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri ded de rus sbal gyi drung du dong ngo / /de nas de gnyid log ste shi ba bzhin du sems
